The 2019-20 season was Liverpool's 128th season of football since they were established. The Reds entered the campaign as Champions of Europe, qualifying for the UEFA Super Cup and the FIFA Club World Cup, as well as featuring in the Community Shield by virtue of finishing second. Liverpool won their first top-flight title since 1990, cruising to victory with seven games remaining. Victories also came in the Super Cup and Club World Cup.
